name: Backup & ForceSub Bot
description: A bot that can be used to create a backup for groups & do force sub on members

API_ID.description: Your telegram API ID, Get it from my.telegram.org

API_HASH.description: Your telegram API HASH, Get it from my.telegram.org

SESSION.description: Pyrogram session generated from the link in Readme

GROUPS.description: ID of the groups where the bot work (seperate by spaces)

CHANNEL_LINK.description: Invite link of Force Sub Channel
